name: Jay Interior Products
overview:
Established in the year 2001, we, ‘Jay Interior Products’, are instrumental in manufacturing and supplying a quality range of Blinds, Awnings, Ceilings & Carpets. The entire range of our products is widely acclaimed in the market for features like flawless quality, long service life, high aesthetic appeal and reliability.

Customisation: To pay respect to the individual preferences of our esteemed clients, we have introduced the facility of customisation to them. We customise our range of home furnishing products as per the exact requirements and specifications of our customers.

Our Team: Industry experts Quality controllers Technocrats Warehousing experts Skilled and semi-skilled personnel Logistic personnel

Quality Assurance: Being a quality-oriented organisation, we do not compromise on the quality in our range of our products. For this purpose, we use quality raw material, sourced from some of the reliable vendors of the industry, for manufacturing the range of products.

Our Infrastructure: We have an advanced infrastructure, which is well-equipped with sophisticated machinery and latest technology. This infrastructure is well-segregated in different departments for the smooth flow of manufacturing, storing, quality control, packaging and other related processes. Moreover, the large production capacity of our manufacturing unit helps us in catering to the bulk and urgent requirements of our customers efficiently.

Warehousing and Packaging: We are backed by a capacious warehouse, which is spread over a vast area and helps us in storing all our products in a systematic manner. Our warehouse is installed with latest technology and material handling equipment that are needed for maintaining a decor inside. It is manned by a team of warehousing experts, which uses all the available resources for assuring systematic work flow.
